snippet: Apple Inc. and Samsung Electronics Co. Ltd. have failed to settle their latest patent dispute despite a daylong meeting between top Samsung executives and Apple CEO Tim Cook hosted by a mediator earlier this month....

headline.print_headline: Apple, Samsung Fail to Settle Before March Trial
headline.main: Apple, Samsung Fail to Settle Before March Trial

lead_paragraph: Apple Inc. and Samsung Electronics Co. Ltd. have failed to settle their latest patent dispute despite a daylong meeting between top Samsung executives and Apple CEO Tim Cook hosted by a mediator earlier this month.
